1.name: Ingresos de fondos
1.description: Funds recieved for use on the activity, which can be from an external or internal source.

2.name: Compromiso de pago saliente
2.description: A firm, written obligation from a donor or provider to provide a specified amount of funds, under particular terms and conditions, for specific purposes, for the benefit of the recipient.

3.name: Desembolso
3.description: Outgoing funds that are placed at the disposal of a recipient government or organisation, or funds transferred between two separately reported activities.

4.name: Gasto
4.description: Outgoing funds that are spent on goods and services for the activity.

5.name: Pago de intereses
5.description: The actual amount of interest paid on a loan or line of credit, including fees.

6.name: Reembolso de un préstamo
6.description: The actual amount of principal (amortisation) repaid, including any arrears.

7.name: Reembolso
7.description: A type of disbursement that covers funds that have already been spent by the recipient, as agreed in the terms of the grant or loan

8.name: Adquisición de capital
8.description: Outgoing funds that are used to purchase equity in a business

9.name: Venta de capital
9.description: Incoming funds from the sale of equity.

10.name: Garantía de crédito
10.description: A commitment made by a funding organisation to underwrite a loan or line of credit entered into by a third party.

11.name: Compromiso de pago entrante
11.description: A firm, written obligation from a donor or provider to provide a specified amount of funds, under particular terms and conditions, reported by a recipient for this activity.

12.name: Promesa de contribución saliente
12.description: Indicative, non-binding advice of an intended outgoing commitment.

13.name: Promesa de contribución entrante
13.description: Indicative, non-binding advice of an intended incoming commitment.
